description:
Successful mentoring doesn't just happen, it's planned. We will discuss what mentoring is not, what mentoring is, factors for effective mentorship, and why it's important to the developer community.

  • Tech Talk for non Techies
  • Jr. Dev Mentoring

Tech is not easy. It's hard, but it's worth it.

The 4 Quadrants of Mentoring

  • Youth - all about them
  • Adult - mutual
  • Personal -
  • Professional -
Mentoring is a relationship.

  • Learners are NOT suffering from impostor syndrome. The are just learning and it is HARD.
  • The first 3 things you need to know to write Clojure: Syntax, Development environment, map
  • No mentor at all is better than having a bad mentor.

Factors for effective mentorship

Mentor:
  • Evaluate your motivation
  • An honest assessment of your time, talent, and temperament.
  • Set realistic goals
Mentee:
  • Reciprocity
  • Respect for mentoring relationship
  • Identified desired outcomes
As a mentor you need Patience, free time, and knowledge of the subject matter.
